CHAT.comment: BOARD OF EDUCATION OF THE CITY SCHOOL DISTRICT OF THE CITY OF NEW YORK, Petitioner v. TOM F., ON BEHALF OF GILBERT F., A MINOR CHILD.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:55 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEONARD KOERNER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL G. GARDEPHE, ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GREGORY G. GARRE, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE SUPPORTING RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LEONARD KOERNER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:55 a.m. the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
